content:
I'm so glad I could help! A $25 gift card to Bed Bath & Beyond or West Elm is a great idea! Both stores offer a wide range of home decor items, and your friend will appreciate the flexibility to choose something they really need or want.

Remember, the gift card is a thoughtful way to show your friend that you care about their new home and want to help them make it special. It's a lovely gesture that will surely be appreciated.

I think you've got a wonderful gift idea now - the personalized doormat, the Voluspa 2-Wick Candle, and a $25 gift card to Bed Bath & Beyond or West Elm. Your friend is sure to love it!

If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope your friend enjoys their gift and settles into their new home nicely!
